data.title: Dua Before Travel
data.translation: Glory be to Him who has subjected this to us

data.title: Dua for Acceptance of Hajj & Umrah
data.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
data.translation: Our Lord, accept this from us. Indeed, You are the All-Hearing, the All-Knowing.

data.title: Dua During Hajj & Umrah
data.arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةًۭ وَفِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ حَسَنَةًۭ وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
data.translation: Our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.
